thread.title: Latest News
thread.title_full: Latest News : Automotive Testing Technology International

author: automotivetestingtechnologyinternational.com
title: Latest News
text:
SHOW NEWS: Automation expertise and engineering
Siemens Factory Automation Engineering (SFAE) offers automation solutions, and service and support in China. In the automotive testing arena, Siemens has devoted itself to powertrain testing and new low-energy vehicle testing. It provides high-speed rotation systems and full power range TIA test systems. These are powerful, flexible and easy to operate.
Its steady system for example, offers high reliability, low energy consumption, high accuracy test and control functions, user friendliness, and a CATSflexible operating interface design. New for 2015, SFAE has integrated the Siemens CATSflexible control platform – instead of CATS TC500 and CATS NT – which is very powerful, fast and lightweight.
Find out more at booth 4072 at Automotive Testing Expo China , which will be held September 15-17, 2015, at The Shanghai Everbright Conference and Exhibition Center, Shanghai, China.
